messages.subject: Unschooling Pool Party in MA This Saturday
messages.msgSnippet: This Saturday (8-26-6) at 1:00 PM is our unschooling pool party in Mashpee, MA.   Activities may include: swimming, bocce, building sandcastles, horseshoes,
messages.messageBody:
This Saturday (8-26-6) at 1:00 PM is our unschooling pool party in Mashpee,
MA. Activities may include: swimming, bocce, building sandcastles,
horseshoes, trampoline jumping, frisbee, bonfire (smores?) and whatever other fun stuff
people come up with. We're up for almost anything. Family baseball game?
Bee-bee gun target shooting? Sharpie body art? Bird watching? We had two
amazing woodpeckers in the yard today. How about an exciting woodworking project?
We could really use a new rabbit hutch or a tree house! A barn raising?
Greased watermelon toss?

We have 6 families coming and welcome others. E-mail me for directions if
you'd like to join us.

Warmly,
Robin


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
